title: Cotton
brief_description: Shows hand and machine picking of cotton in the United States, followed by extraction of seeds by gin. Also explains how the cotton is baled, cleaned, fluffed, carded, spun into yarn, and finally woven into cloth.
description: Shows hand and machine picking of cotton in the United States, followed by extraction of seeds by gin. Also explains how the cotton is baled, cleaned, fluffed, carded, spun into yarn, and finally woven into cloth.
